ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: and by the dawn when it exhales,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and the morn as it breathes.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And by oath of the morning when it takes birth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And by the day when it Tanaffas.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And the morning when it brightens,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and the first breath of morning.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And by the morning when it shineth forth,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: by the dawn as it breathes:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And the Dawn as it breathes away the darkness;-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And by the dawn as it brightens;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and the morning when it extends,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And by the morn as it breathes.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And by the dawn when it breathes
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [81:18] and [by] the dawn as it breathes, [as] it extends until it becomes broad daylight,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: And the breath of morning) and when the morning and brightens come; Allah swore by all these
